metadata.title: USPTO Trademark API Filing Scaffold
metadata.applicant: Jason I. Proper / BGBH Threads LLC
metadata.notes: This JSON scaffold is designed for programmatic USPTO trademark filing via CLI, webhook, or API integration.

description.full: The mark consists of the standard characters 'AVRT' representing Advanced Voice Reasoning Technology, an ethical middleware firewall for AI systems.
description.meaning: AVRT is an acronym for Advanced Voice Reasoning Technology.

international_classes.description: Computer software for artificial intelligence safety and content moderation; downloadable middleware software for ethical AI validation; voice-first AI firewall software; software for real-time AI output screening and validation; computer software development tools for implementing ethical AI protocols; downloadable mobile applications for voice-based AI interaction monitoring.

Software as a service (SaaS) services featuring software for AI safety validation; platform as a service (PaaS) featuring computer software platforms for ethical AI middleware; providing temporary use of online non-downloadable software for monitoring and validating AI-generated content; computer software consulting services in the field of AI ethics and safety; technical support services, namely, troubleshooting of computer software problems related to AI content validation; research and development services in the field of artificial intelligence ethics and safety protocols.

trademarks.specimen_description: Screenshot of software interface showing AVRT branding

description.full: The mark consists of the standard characters 'SPIEL' representing the acronym for Safety, Personalization, Integrity, Ethics, and Logic framework used in AI ethical validation.
description.meaning: SPIEL is an acronym for Safety, Personalization, Integrity, Ethics, and Logic.

international_classes.description: Computer software implementing ethical AI frameworks; downloadable software for evaluating AI safety, personalization, integrity, ethics, and logic; software development kits (SDK) for implementing ethical AI protocols; computer software for analyzing and scoring AI-generated content based on ethical criteria.

Software as a service (SaaS) featuring ethical AI evaluation frameworks; providing online non-downloadable software for implementing safety, personalization, integrity, ethics, and logic validation in AI systems; consulting services in the field of ethical AI framework implementation.

trademarks.specimen_description: Screenshot showing SPIEL framework in use

description.full: The mark consists of the standard characters 'THT' representing the protocol for Truth, Honesty, and Transparency in AI communications and validation.
description.meaning: THT is an acronym for Truth, Honesty, and Transparency.

international_classes.description: Computer software for AI content validation and verification; software for ensuring truth, honesty, and transparency in artificial intelligence systems; downloadable middleware for validating factual accuracy of AI-generated content; software for detecting misinformation and manipulation in AI outputs.

Software as a service (SaaS) featuring AI truth verification protocols; platform services for implementing transparency and honesty validation in AI systems; consulting services related to AI fact-checking and verification technologies.

trademarks.specimen_description: Screenshot of THT protocol validation interface

description.full: The mark consists of the standard characters 'EaaS' representing Ethics as a Service, a cloud-based platform providing ethical validation for AI systems.
description.meaning: EaaS is an acronym for Ethics as a Service.

international_classes.description: Platform as a service (PaaS) featuring ethical validation for AI applications; software as a service (SaaS) providing ethics compliance checking for artificial intelligence systems; cloud computing services featuring ethical AI frameworks; providing temporary use of online non-downloadable software for ethical evaluation of AI-generated content; consulting services in the field of AI ethics implementation and compliance.
Downloadable cloud-based software for AI ethics validation; software for providing ethics-as-a-service functionality; API software for integrating ethical validation into AI applications.

description.full: The mark consists of the standard characters 'AWOGO' representing Always Working On Getting Organized, a productivity and organization methodology for neurodivergent individuals.
description.meaning: AWOGO is an acronym for Always Working On Getting Organized.

international_classes.description: Computer software for personal productivity and organization; downloadable mobile applications for task management and workflow organization; AI-assisted productivity software; software for neurodivergent-friendly task management; downloadable software for voice-based productivity tracking and organization.

Software as a service (SaaS) featuring productivity and organization tools; providing online non-downloadable software for AI-assisted task management; platform services for neurodivergent-accessible productivity workflows; consulting services in the field of productivity software implementation.

Educational services, namely, providing training and workshops in the field of personal productivity and organization for neurodivergent individuals; coaching services in the field of task management and productivity optimization.

trademarks.specimen_description: Screenshot of AWOGO productivity app interface

fees.notes: TEAS Plus: $250/class. AVRT (2 classes), SPIEL (2 classes), THT (2 classes), EaaS (2 classes), AWOGO (3 classes) = 11 classes total = $2,750 estimated

cli_commands.description: Example CLI commands for USPTO API interaction (pseudo-code)

commands.name: submit_trademark
commands.description: Submit all trademark applications from XML file

commands.name: check_status
commands.description: Check filing status of trademark application

commands.name: pay_fees
commands.description: Pay filing fees for trademark class

immediate: Prepare specimen files (screenshots) for each trademark
Obtain USPTO.gov account and API key
Review and finalize goods/services descriptions with attorney
before_filing: Conduct comprehensive trademark search via USPTO TESS
Review conflicting marks and assess likelihood of confusion
Prepare Statement of Use evidence (if switching from 1(b) to 1(a))
Confirm filing fees and payment method
Schedule consultation with Falcon Rappaport LLP
post_filing: Monitor USPTO Trademark Status & Document Retrieval (TSDR)
Respond to Office Actions within 6 months
File Statement of Use within 6 months of Notice of Allowance
Set up webhook notifications for status changes
Maintain records for audit and renewal

patent.title: Advanced Voice Reasoning Technology for AI Safety
